content: Using sql.NullString for optional fields in SQLite models prevents nil pointer dereferences when scanning NULL columns without requiring COALESCE in every query.
Wrapping plugin.Register in a recover block allows test files to call it multiple times without panicking on duplicate registration.
All-or-nothing validation in sync push (reject entire batch if any entry fails) simplifies error recovery for clients compared to partial acceptance.
Cursor-based pagination with after=sequence&limit=N provides stable pagination even when new entries are appended during iteration.
Generating snapshots as temporary files then renaming to final path ensures atomic visibility — readers never see partial snapshots.
